text: Barbro Margareta Svensson, known as Lill-Babs (9 March 1938 – 3 April 2018), was a Swedish singer, actress and television presenter. She represented Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1961 in Cannes with the song "April, april". She was also well-known for the song "Är du kär i mej ännu Klas-Göran?". Lill- Babs died of heart failure complicated by cancer in Stockholm on 3 April 2018 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish singers Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish television presenters Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Lill-Babs
